How to upgrade the mobile font from Sophie's IcoMoon project:
  • CSS CLASSES
    • Open "style.css" file and copy all ".icon-s-m-*" css classes definitions in the clipboard
    • Open "sage-mobile-apps.css" file and remove all ".s-m-*" css classe definitions
    • Paste ".icon-s-m-*" css classes definitions to ""sage-mobile-apps.css file
    • Replace ".icon-s-m-" string by ".s-m-" definitions in "sage-mobile-apps.css"
    • Save "sage-mobile-apps.css" file
  • FONT FILES
    • Copy "icomoon.eot, .svg, .ttf, .woff" files to "css/fonts" folder
    • Remove "sage-mobile-apps.eot, .svg, .ttf, .woff" file from font folder
    • Rename "icomoon.eot, .svg, .ttf, .woff" to "sage-mobile-apps.eot, .svg, .ttf, .woff"
  • DEMO FILE
    If there are css that have been added/removed/modified
    • Open "sage-mobile-apps-demo.html" file
    • Add/Remove/modify css classes, labels...
